ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We thank Mr. Victor Nana for the collection and identification of the plant material. We are indebted to Mr. Felix Fehr (Department of Chemistry, University of Fribourg) and to Koert’s group (Philipps-Universitat Marburg) for spectral analyses; we also thank the German cooperation through the DAAD/YaBiNaPa program for running the LC–MS analyses.
